question: Where does REGN5458 bind to?
ideal_answer: The bispecific antibody REGN5458 binds to B-cell maturation antigen (BCMA) and CD3.

snippets.text: Here we describe a fully human bsAb (REGN5458) that binds to B-cell maturation antigen (BCMA) and CD3, and compare its antitumor activities vs those of anti-BCMA CAR T cells to identify differences in efficacy and mechanism of action.
